original_name: I Want to Look Like a High School Cheerleader Again
plot: 10 former high school cheerleaders compete for a $50,000 prize and a chance to relive their glory days in front of a live audience with the help of Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders trainer Jay Johnson and his wife, Lin.
plot_en: 10 former high school cheerleaders compete for a $50,000 prize and a chance to relive their glory days in front of a live audience with the help of Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders trainer Jay Johnson and his wife, Lin.
plot_es: 10 former high school cheerleaders compete for a $50,000 prize and a chance to relive their glory days in front of a live audience with the help of Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders trainer Jay Johnson and his wife, Lin.
title: I Want to Look Like a High School Cheerleader Again
